attributes.action: immediately confirm reports that he destroyed public property by pushing a laser printer off his desk.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If this incident happened then Mr Gordon Brown committed a criminal offence and needs to be charged.  If he has the balls to confirm the reports are true then I have the balls to make a formal complaint to the police services of this country.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
